item.description:
Antico Forno (http://www.anticofornoboston.com/) is about 15 years old and is owned by a North End native. The restaurant's name means "old oven" and it is known for its wood-burning oven. The place has a warm cozy atmosphere. Pizzas are especially tasty but they have many appetizers and entrees to choose from. Proportions are large. Price ranges are: Appetizers $7-18, Pizzas $13-17, Entrees $17-24. Coming from the Greenway, the restaurant is a short way down Salem St. on the right side.

We'll begin the evening with a cocktail hour from 6:00-7:00 at the bar and follow dinner with a visit to a local cafe for cappuccino, espresso & pastries. Please bring cash, as we will not be getting separate checks.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar from 6:00-7:00
item.name: Antico Forno-Dinner
